tool_description: Recommends optimal cooking techniques based on ingredients, available equipment, desired outcomes, and cook skill level.

primary_ingredient.description: The main ingredient that will determine cooking method

ingredient_cut_size.description: Size/cut of the ingredient: whole, large_pieces, medium_pieces, small_pieces, minced

desired_texture.description: Target texture: crispy, tender, caramelized, rare, well_done

time_constraint.description: Maximum cooking time available in minutes

error_messages: Ingredient not recognized: Use common ingredient names like chicken, beef, salmon, broccoli, etc.
Invalid cut size: Use one of [whole, large_pieces, medium_pieces, small_pieces, minced].
Invalid texture goal: Use one of [crispy, tender, caramelized, rare, well_done].
Equipment not recognized: Use standard equipment names like stovetop, oven, grill, steamer, etc.
Time constraint too restrictive: Some ingredients require minimum cooking times for safety.
usage: Provide the primary ingredient and optionally specify cut size, desired texture, available equipment, and time constraints. The tool recommends optimal cooking methods with explanations.

alternative_methods.description: Alternative cooking methods ranked by suitability

cooking_temperature.description: Recommended cooking temperature and heat level

technique_tips.description: Specific tips for executing the recommended method successfully
